tool_description: Free, powerful Video to GIF API for developers and businesses
name: giflayer
title: giflayer

api_list.name: /capture
api_list.description: Main API endpoint used to generate GIFs

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The video URL you would like to generate a GIF from

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The starting time (in seconds) of your GIF

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: The ending time (in seconds) of your GIF

optional_parameters.name: duration
optional_parameters.description: The duration (in seconds) of your GIF

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: resize the GIF to the dimensions of your choice (accepts width and height in pixels) (Default: 300x200)

optional_parameters.name: crop
optional_parameters.description: Crop the GIF to the size of your choice (accepts width and height in pixels)

optional_parameters.name: fps
optional_parameters.description: specify a GIF quality (Frames per Second) of your choice (Default: 15)

optional_parameters.name: trailer
optional_parameters.description: Set to "1" to create default trailer, or specify custom trailer parameters
